[b][color=white]Hackuman Invisibility[/color][/b]
A new item has been introduced in the Hackuman game, Invisibility. You can now be invisible from the battle page. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6062658]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crew Tier Changes[/color][/b]
Crew Tiers have been altered. Check out the dedicated thread for more information. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6063380]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF Phishing Attempts[/color][/b]
Recently, a member of HF has been caught attempting Phishing. He has been banned. Kindly, stay safe when using HF. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6063789]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6062658][color=#FFFFFF]Hackuman Invisibility[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
Xerotic has added a brand-new item to the hackuman game. You can now buy an invisibility perk in the shop. The perk will make your hackuman invisible, and other players won't be able to attack your monster with the perk active. But if you do attack with that hackuman, the perk will disappear. This is one of the first official threads that is talking about the hackuman game with features on the main topic. You may also notice within the thread there is a title image that reads hackuman. This looks to be the first look at the game title image.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6061954][color=#FFFFFF]A Doctor Who Met Putin Just Tested Positive, Crackdowns in Russia Could Get Serious[/color][/url] - [mention=4638342]
According to an online source, a doctor called Dr. Denis Protsenko who recently went to Russia to meet up with President Vladimir Putin has tested positive to having the coronavirus. They have stated with other press that they were talking extensively without protection and photographs even show them shaking hands and talking together with very little "social distancing."

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059977][color=#FFFFFF]Prince Charles has Corona![/color][/url] - [mention=89554]
The BBC has shared with the world that the Prince of Wales has tested positive for the coronavirus. Prince Charles has started to show mild symptoms, they have said that they are still in good health and are now self-isolating in Balmoral. His wife Camilla is also with him on the self-isolating and is taking care of each other.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6062991][color=#FFFFFF]China has learnt nothing[/color][/url] - [mention=4571478]
China (Wuhan) has started once again selling bats that are meant to be eaten. It was announced that bats from Wuhan were the source of the coronavirus. The bats were brought back to the food markets after their quarantine was lifted. People around the world have come forward with a lot of rage and arguments about the whole thing as they think it will infect even more people around the world.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6063040][color=#FFFFFF]Instructions on how to workout during corona pandemic - visualized guide[/color][/url] - [mention=129349]
Eagle 95 has found a video on youtube that will help everyone on Hack Forums. The video is about how to workout during the lockdown. The video has some very strange messages and vibes towards the viewer but we think it may just help you stay ahead during your self-isolation. It may even help you survive inside for another week.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6062256][color=#FFFFFF]EXPOSED APRIL FOOLS SCAMMMED[/color][/url] - [mention=2331053]
On the 1st of April, it was April fools day and everyone got a message about how they would have to pay $20 to recover there account. This joke made a lot of people get their wallets out to get ready to pay some money forward. What you may not have seen is that some users were making there own April fools joke threads. There weren't many threads made this year but we do hope you enjoy this one.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6060284][color=#FFFFFF]Funny COVID-20 tinder pickup lines[/color][/url] - [mention=261072]
Tinder is a very funny place for some people and for others, it's where people find hookups. We are going to try and stick to the funny side as the thread by Sir Capalot is talking about funny pick up lines we could all start using while we are all in lockdown. Many members have sent a few good ones, but we think that you will find the original post very fun to read.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6060800][color=#FFFFFF]3x $5 BTC Giveaway (Multiple Entries - 1/Day)[/color][/url] - [mention=1830072]
Trippy Space Cat is hosting a little giveaway for three lucky winners. Each winner will get $5 BTC. You may enter as many times as you like and you don't even have to have an upgraded account to enter the giveaway. 
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4336296][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/worldnews-simplicity.png[/img][/url][/align]


[b][color=white]The world in its current state[/color][/b]
The biggest issue in such concerning times is the panic. You see it on your TV every night; you see it outside every time you go for a walk, you see it in the stores, where scarcity of stock is a big problem which in turn has proven to be a devastating factor that prevents the purchase of essential products by many of the people in need. We should stay calm and help each other instead of going with the saying, "It's every man for himself." Mass panic is likely to continue spreading. However, we must not succumb to such feelings.

[b][color=white]The lockdown situation in Germany[/color][/b]
The Chancellor of Germany, Angela Merkel, believes that it is too early to lift the movement restrictions enforced by the lockdown despite signs that the coronavirus disease is spreading slower than before. Merkel appealed to the people to adhere to the rules for social isolation and hygiene. The Chancellor is optimistic that she will be able to cope with the pandemic and face it with all her power to keep things from getting worse. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.straitstimes.com/world/europe/too-early-to-ease-lockdown-in-germany-merkel]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Gas explosion near the capital of Russia[/color][/b]
One person was killed and four were injured as a gas explosion ripped through a five-story residential building outside Moscow (in Orekhovo-Zuyevo) causing an entire section of the brick building to collapse. The exact details surrounding the incident are not yet clear.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.straitstimes.com/world/europe/one-dead-in-gas-explosion-outside-moscow] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Apple Acquires Dark Sky[/color][/b]
Apple has acquired the famous Dark Sky weather app. Following this recent change in ownership, Android and Wear OS versions will be shut down on July 1, 2020. Subscribers who continue to use the service until July 1 will be refunded. It should also be noted that Dark Sky will no longer allow any new API registrations. The API will continue to run until the end of 2021. The team behind Dark Sky ended the blog with, “We look forward to continuing to build great products, so stay tuned…” [i][size=x-small][url=https://blog.darksky.net/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google – Mobility Reports[/color][/b]
Google is playing a significant role in the outbreak of COVID-19 by providing health authorities with data on human movements. They also released a mobility report on each country, state, county, etc., with various categories showing an increase or decrease in people's movements. Any of them include parks, grocery stores, neighborhoods, etc. It’s off by default. Such reports will show patterns over a span of "several weeks" with data being collected from the last 48 to 72 hours.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.blog.google/technology/health/covid-19-community-mobility-reports] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Venmo and Cash App Offering a Hand [/color][/b]
Venmo and Cash App, both popular apps among people sending each other money, are trying to make life easier for the government. With stimulus checks emerging early or later for individuals, depending on a few factors, both services have launched a public campaign to the Treasury Department to enable them to carry out checks at a much faster pace. The greatest advantage is that money is sent electronically instead of a physical check in the mail. This would benefit Americans who do not have their bank details on file with the IRS for direct deposit. Both companies are going through the initiative because they know the government needs to get the money out quickly. The Treasury refused to comment on the case.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/27/tech/venmo-cash-app-stimulus/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]'Boku no Hero Academia' Gets Fifth Anime Season[/color][/b]
The fifth season of My Hero Academia has been announced! No further information has been released, but below you can find the trailer preview which doesn't let us know anything about the next season so far.
[spoiler][yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2hOACVLT8Pk[/yt][/spoiler] [i][size=x-small][url=https://myanimelist.net/news/59502419]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hentai Manga Publisher Fakku Opens Free Access to Subscription Content For Two Weeks[/color][/b]
Yeah, that's right. Your eyes just met with the title "hentai". Fakku, a well-known website among the manga and adult community has recently stated that all of their premium content will be available to the public for free for the next two weeks. "As the world continues to practice social distancing to fight the spread of COVID-19, we must come together and stay inside", the website states. Considering the website has adult content on it, we cannot link it here, but a simple Google search should allow you to find the website if necessary. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-03-31/hentai-manga-publisher-fakku-opens-free-access-to-subscription-content-for-two-weeks/.158142]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cosplayer Enako Appointed Cool Japan Ambassador[/color][/b]
Enako is a professional cosplayer from Japan. Recently she was hired by the Japanese government to become an ambassador for Cool Japan and Tweeted about her excitement. You can find her Tweet [url=https://twitter.com/enako_cos/status/1245276964643987457]here[/url], which translates to "I will do my utmost to spread the pop culture I love, as an ambassador and as a cosplayer!". Cool Japan is a program that was created in 2002 and serves the purpose of promoting Japan's modern-day culture through its celebrities and media to countries abroad. The program is not only supported by the Japanese government but other companies in the country too! Enako has made over a million yen (around $9,000) from her career as a cosplay model. One of her life long dreams while persuing this career was to eventually get employed by the country somehow. Well, her dream finally came true and with that, good luck Enako! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-04-04/cosplayer-enako-appointed-cool-japan-ambassador/.158215]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Comiket 98 Catalog Briefly Tops Amazon JP Sales Rankings[/color][/b]
With the COVID-19 virus running amuck, many events have had to cancel their events to take precautions, allowing us to practice social distancing. Comiket is the most well-known doujinshi convention that takes place in Japan. Just like any other anime and manga convention, people can cosplay as their favorite characters, meet new people, and even purchase fan-made or professional works of art. Because of the virus, the event was canceled. But that doesn't stop those who were interested. A Comiket 98 catalog was created and posted on Amazon Japan. By purchasing the catalog, it allowed people to support the convention, despite it being canceled and the goal was to support future events. With the number of people that purchased it, the catalog then became the best selling book on Amazon Japan. However, over time, the catalog is slowly falling in the rankings and at the time of writing this, it is now in seventh place. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-03-31/comiket-98-catalog-briefly-tops-amazon-jp-sales-rankings/.158125]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
